original_text: As for the likeness of their faces, they four had the face of a man, and the face of a lion, on the right side: and they four had the face of an ox on the left side; they four also had the face of an eagle.
korean_text: 그 얼굴들의 모양은 넷의 앞은 사람의 얼굴이요 넷의 오른쪽은 사자의 얼굴이요 넷의 왼쪽은 소의 얼굴이요 넷의 뒤는 독수리의 얼굴이니

sentences.original_text: As for the likeness of their faces
they four had the face of a man
and the face of a lion on the right side
and they four had the face of an ox on the left side
sentences.korean_translation: 그 넷은 왼쪽에 소의 얼굴을 가졌고

sentences.original_text: they four also had the face of an eagle
sentences.korean_translation: 그 넷은 또 독수리의 얼굴도 가졌더라
